statements: SELECT * FROM DiseaseData
SELECT disease_name, outbreak_date FROM DiseaseData
SELECT disease_id, prevalence_rate FROM DiseaseData
SELECT * FROM DiseaseData ORDER BY disease_name DESC
SELECT disease_name, outbreak_date FROM DiseaseData WHERE outbreak_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM DiseaseData WHERE disease_id = 5 ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC;
SELECT disease_name, prevalence_rate FROM DiseaseData WHERE prevalence_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY prevalence_rate DESC;
SELECT disease_name, outbreak_date FROM DiseaseData WHERE outbreak_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY outbreak_date;
SELECT disease_name, prevalence_rate FROM DiseaseData WHERE disease_name LIKE '%flu%' ORDER BY disease_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM DiseaseData WHERE prevalence_rate < 0.2 AND outbreak_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM disease_prevalence
SELECT disease_name, prevalence_rate FROM disease_prevalence WHERE prevalence_rate > 0.05
SELECT disease_name, outbreak_pattern FROM disease_prevalence WHERE disease_id = 3
SELECT * FROM research_data ORDER BY research_date DESC
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM research_data
SELECT disease_id, disease_name, prevalence_rate FROM disease_prevalence ORDER BY prevalence_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT researcher_name, research_topic FROM research_data WHERE research_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT disease_name, prevalence_rate, outbreak_pattern FROM disease_prevalence WHERE prevalence_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY prevalence_rate DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, research_date FROM research_data WHERE research_topic LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY research_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM research_data JOIN disease_prevalence ON research_data.research_id = disease_prevalence.disease_id;
SELECT * FROM diseases;
SELECT name, prevalence FROM diseases;
SELECT location, date FROM outbreaks ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT name, institution FROM researchers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT disease_id, location, date FROM outbreaks WHERE location='City X';
SELECT * FROM diseases WHERE prevalence > 0.05 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, location, date FROM outbreaks WHERE location = 'New York' AND date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT name, institution FROM researchers WHERE institution LIKE '%University%' ORDER BY institution, name ASC;
SELECT d.name AS disease_name, o.location AS outbreak_location, o.date AS outbreak_date FROM diseases d INNER JOIN outbreaks o ON d.id = o.disease_id;
SELECT r.name AS researcher_name, r.institution AS researcher_institution, d.name AS researched_disease FROM researchers r LEFT JOIN diseases d ON r.id = d.id;
SELECT * FROM diseases;
SELECT outbreak_id, outbreak_date, location FROM outbreaks ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, area_of_study FROM researchers WHERE area_of_study = 'Epidemiology';
SELECT disease_name, prevalence_rate FROM diseases WHERE prevalence_rate > 5.0;
SELECT project_id, researcher_id, disease_id, start_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT disease_name, prevalence_rate FROM diseases WHERE prevalence_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY disease_name ASC;
SELECT researcher_name, area_of_study FROM researchers WHERE area_of_study = 'Epidemiology' ORDER BY researcher_name DESC;
SELECT project_id, start_date, end_date FROM research_projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT disease_name, outbreak_date, location FROM diseases JOIN outbreaks ON diseases.disease_id = outbreaks.disease_id;
SELECT * FROM researchers JOIN research_projects ON researchers.researcher_id = research_projects.researcher_id WHERE research_projects.end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreaks;
SELECT disease_name, location FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE affected_population > 1000;
SELECT outbreak_date, location FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE disease_name = 'Malaria';
SELECT outbreak_id, outbreak_date, affected_population FROM DiseaseOutbreaks ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM DiseasePrevalence WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT * FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE affected_population > 1000 ORDER BY outbreak_date DESC;
SELECT disease_name, outbreak_date FROM DiseaseOutbreaks WHERE location='New York' AND outbreak_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Researchers JOIN ResearchProjects ON Researchers.researcher_id = ResearchProjects.researcher_id WHERE ResearchProjects.funding_source LIKE '%NIH%';
SELECT disease_name, year, prevalence_percentage FROM DiseasePrevalence GROUP BY disease_name, year HAVING AVG(prevalence_percentage) > 3.0;

SELECT publication_date, project_title, Researchers.name FROM ResearchPublications JOIN ResearchProjects ON ResearchPublications.researcher_id = ResearchProjects.researcher_id WHERE Researchers.specialty='Epidemiology';
